body.name: GRANITE STONE 10" Non-Stick Frying Pan with Mineral/Diamond Coating for Long long-lasting nonstick Frying, Skillet for Cooking with Stay Cool Handles, Oven/Dishwasher Safe, Non-Toxic
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 24 mins
features: ORIGINAL GRANITE PAN – the revolutionary Granitestone pan, now available on Amazon. Get the pan that changed kitchen’s across America with it’s mineral and diamond based ultra nonstick and easy clean coating – and is 100% toxin free and healthy to use

10” MULTIPURPOSE FRYING PAN – the 10” skillet is pan is ideal for nearly every situation, perfect for sunny side ups, sauteing vegetables, steaming broccoli, whipping up pancakes, scrambled eggs and omelets, searing steaks, grilling burgers and so much more.

ULTIMATE NONSTICK – the Granitestone nonstick cooking surface is derived from natural minerals, coated three times and then reinforced with diamonds to deliver the ultimate food release. No seasoning or even oil or butter needed, makes for healthier eating, and provides for hassle free, 1-2-3 cleanup.
HEALTHY & NON-TOXIC – the Granitestone coating is free of PFOA, PFOS, lead & cadmium for a healthy and safe experience day in and out.

SUPER DURABLE – the coating of the pan is infused with synthetic diamonds, the strongest material on earth which makes it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick use
EFFORTLESS CLEANUP, DISHWASHER SAFE– spend less time with cleanup! After all the cooking and prepping is done, place cookware in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleanup.
STOVETOP & OVEN SAFE - compatible with all stovetops besides induction & oven safe up to a sizzling 500° F
STAY COOL HANDLES – the stainless-steel handles are ergonomically designed for both righty and lefties & the unique Y shaped handles let’s heat escape and keeps the handles cool to the touch.
EVEN HEAT DISTRIBUTION – the aluminum composition of this frying pan and the unique spiralized bottom design ensures even heat distribution all around with no dead zones or hot spots.
body.description: Granitestone 10-inch Pan Are you tired of purchasing frying pans that stick, scratch, ding, or warp? Introducing the all-new As Seen On TV's Granitestone!! Our cookware are designed to withstand just about anything, all thanks to the triple Granite external layer and a high-grade pressed aluminum inner component. And of course, what good is a pan is if you cannot bake in it? All of our pans are oven-safe for up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit. To help you appreciate this heat threshold, your average cake requires a measly 300 degrees to fully cook. The Granitestone can withstand heat levels almost double that, so you know you know warping (and sticking) will never be a worry! Additional Features: With "Stay-cool" handles that doesn't heat up while cooking! Granitestone frying pans are PFOA-Free. Dishwasher-safe so cleanup will never be an issue! Fry, bake, saute, sear. Customer Service Details We here at Granitestone are never truly satisfied unless you are. If you encounter, or suspect issues with your purchased product please send us an email and we will be more than happy to fix everything for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra Nonstick. Coated three times with our mineral coating for the ultimate nonstick experience – without oil and butter. Food glides around on the pan and nothing sticks, even after years of use. 100% PFOA Free. The healthy mineral nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium, so it will never release toxic fumes, even if it’s accidentally overheated. Metal Utensil Safe. The coating is reinforced with diamond-like particles, making it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks & even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick use Dishwasher Safe. Allows for an easy cleanup. Simply wipe down and throw in the dishwasher for the super quick experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High performance cookware
reviews.reviewText: This frying pan it has a durable surface heats quickly and evenly and is simple to clean. Nothing sticks to it. It's lightweight but has the cooking efficiency of much heavier cookware. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I like to cook and like everyone we have a lot of cookware... we are also conscientious in regards to unhealthy nonstick... we like cast iron ... we own French cookware without naming the company... when one of our non stick frying pans from this company became...unhealthy...I purchased this pan..We have used it fir several months and it's impressive... only thing that is noticeable is that it is really light weight?? Used to a heavier unit... the non stick is non stick and proven to be extremely durable... This is the real deal... I use this pan more than any other... it cleans up easier than ANY pan I have ever used... been cooking since I was kid so that would be 50 years of experience with expensive cookware as well as more affordable..... the 100 year old cast iron pans are great...certain recipes will always use these.....but, honestly this one takes so little time to clean and care for and produces wonderful results... truly impressed... A great pan... awesome

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The egg didn't stick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than I anticipated
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new egg pan and based on the low price I thought to give this a try.So far it seems ideal, even heat distrubution on an electric range top and very easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and clean frying pan
reviews.reviewText: I love this pan because it's non-stick and easy to clean, even in the dishwasher.You can also keep food hot in the oven in the same pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight, great size, cleans up easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's not nonstick!
reviews.reviewText: So disappointing--it isn't nonstick! So excited to try my new pan. On the positive side, it's nice and light and appears well made. Tried making an omelet -- no butter in pan unlike what I usually do. When i tried to flip it, oh no, it stuck to the pan! Clean up involved the rough side of a scrubby sponge. Used medium heat. Maybe that was too high. Tried again with fried eggs today--low heat. Flipped the eggs --stuck again!Not sure if I'm going to keep it. Will try again using my usual butter or olive oil. Too bad it's just not what I expected -- or as advertised!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fried egg didn't stick to it!!! Yay!!!
reviews.reviewText: I've only had it about a week, but foods aren't sticking to it. I'm only using metal utensils and yet the pan hasn't gotten scratched up. It's a win in my book! I've even now ordered the larger one, too.
Años buscando un buen sartén en donde hacer unos huevitos estrellados sin que se pegara, fácil de voltear y con buen cocimiento, ahora que tengo este sartén disfruto mucho mi desayuno !!
Hasta el momento no se pega y funciona de maravilla, solo tengo una semana de uso. El reto es que dure como dice. Pero super bien hecho buen calidad y excelente precio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like it and would like to have a lid too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Top of the line pan, I only trust GRANITEROCK
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this pan Nov 11 2018.It is now July 17 2019, I specifically waited a long time to review this pan because I wanted to give it the test of time and day to day use of cooking.This pan has been amazing since day one, the build quality, the design of the handle, the aesthetics, the functionality, everything. Everyone in my family has been loving it, especially my sister who recently went on a diet which she had to cut oil from her cooking for chicken and eggs and everything.Everyone knows when you cook eggs or chicken without oil on a pan, It is going to stick no question about that..That is where GRANITEROCK comes in.. This pan is probably one of few as seen on TV products that doesn't lie in their exaggerated infomercials, I put through all the tests and it reigned supreme, some crumbs and residue might stick but minimal amount but the cleaning of this pan only requires light scrubbing and everything comes off with ease, no hassle with cleaning.. The handle is designed smart that it doesn't give off heat when you hold it, it keeps cool to the touch no matter what.After this pan came out a lot of big household companies that we know like T-FAL and CUISINE-ART made their own but this one is the OG and really is the best, don't waste your time and money on the others.I will include a video of cooking eggs on the GRANITEROCK with ZERO oil added, watch it glide off the pan with no residue or left over egg. It's quite amazing and this was after a 8 months of ownership, it still does it like the first day I got it.Get this pan, you won't be disapointed.
